elements.text: During a meeting today, you have a thought that you think is really insightful. You didn't get the chance to bring it up in the meeting, but you want to email your department head about it. When you send the email, you feel proud of yourself for sharing your...

elements.name: Insightful Email_Mental Health_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
